previewArticle.title: Mexico vs. Bosnia-Herzegovina | International Friendly Preview

recapArticle.title: Mexico 0, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Guanajuato Informa
timelineItems.text: #ALMOMENTO Arranca penúltimo partido de preparación de @miseleccionmx enfrentado a #Bosnia en el Soldier Field de Chicago #RumboaBrasil2014

timelineItems.name: Adrian López
timelineItems.text: The first ten minutes have been rough. #VamosMexico #ContigoSiempre

timelineItems.name: ⚽Edduzzu⚽
timelineItems.text: #Bosnia muy cerca de hacer el primer gol!! Para el que piense que #México va ser campeón en #Brasil2014 ve este partido y rectifique.

timelineItems.name: Paul Wilkins
timelineItems.text: Mexico v Bosnia. #worldcupwarmup #fifaworldcup #football #mexico #bosnia #theworldgame #chicago #soldierfield #beardown

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Teething problems for El Tri with this line-up. Players not in tune with each other early on.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Emir Spahic.

timelineItems.name: SinCensuraconSerrano
timelineItems.text: Un inicio complicado para la escuadra mexicana, que no controla el balón y lo pierde fácilmente. #Tri vs #Bosnia en #Chicago

timelineItems.name: Julio
timelineItems.text: Que diferencia de rival es Bosnia, que calidad la de @EdDzeko. @miseleccionmx en apuros. #QuieroCreer que un empate sería un premio... :O

timelineItems.name: Oscar Mayans
timelineItems.text: No entiendo como el árbitro dejo jugar a #talavera con un uniforme azul igual al de #Bosnia @miseleccionmx que error

timelineItems.name: Adela Mustafić
timelineItems.text: Bosnia got this! They're playing with full force & with the intention of winning! #BiH #BiHDragons ������

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Mexico. Héctor Herrera tries a through ball, but Javier Hernández is caught offside.
Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diego Reyes (Mexico).
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Foul by Héctor Herrera (Mexico).
Sejad Salihovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: nʇuɐɔ oʇsǝuɹǝ
timelineItems.text: Quien es el técnico de bosnia ¿Pepivic Guardiolosevic? #eltri @MiSeleccionMx @SanCadilla

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Talavera looking a little nervous in goal. Corona and Ochoa's experience puts them ahead of him for me.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.
Foul by Héctor Herrera (Mexico).
Zvjezdan Misimovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Southern Soccer Guy
timelineItems.text: Yo...Bosnia can ball. #mexvbih

timelineItems.name: Andy Lemus
timelineItems.text: Mexico game in Chicago! These Mexican getting rowdy! Let's take the win against Bosnia! Viva Mexico!

timelineItems.name: Esto en Línea
timelineItems.text: 17', México no encuentra el balón. Los jugadores de Bosnia presionan constantemente al conjunto nacional #México 0-0 #Bosnia

timelineItems.comment: Miguel Layún (Mexico) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Quadratin Mundial
timelineItems.text: 3 movimientos de última hora con #Bosnia: juegan Dzeko, Misimovic y Salihovic NO empiezan Kolasinac, Vranjes y Hadzic

timelineItems.name: Toño “MORA“ Morales
timelineItems.text: #MORA Ladiferencia en estilo los europeos dos toques horizontales y el 3ro para adelante, hasta terminar la jugada. #México vs. #Bosnia

timelineItems.name: CK
timelineItems.text: At least confront the right guy, Layun... #ElTri

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Mexico 0, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1.

timelineItems.name: marianela villanueva
timelineItems.text: Mi humilde opinión futbolera ; se necesita orden, estrategia y claridad de juego. Esperemos que mejoren #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: JerseyJon.com
timelineItems.text: @miseleccionmx Just realized @HectorMorenoh is wearing the captain's armband. Long overdue! and Felicades. #eltri #MEXvBOS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Mexico. Carlos Salcido tries a through ball, but Raúl Jiménez is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Rachel Strevey
timelineItems.text: #mexico v #bosnia #worldcup friendly game. #lovemycity

timelineItems.name: Izzy Becirevic
timelineItems.text: Miguel Layun would get murdered by Besic. #Zmajevi

timelineItems.comment: Javier Hernández (Mexico) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Miguel Layún with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Bosnia defending with a high line. Can see the Mexico players looking to play the ball over the top for Chicharito like v France at WC2010.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Miguel Ponce (Mexico).
Izet Hajrovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Logan May
timelineItems.text: Chicharitos first touch was perfect. Should be a goal for the #ElTri

timelineItems.name: •René Olmos•
timelineItems.text: Palo salva a #Bosnia

timelineItems.name: Oscar Valderrama
timelineItems.text: Hector Herrera se convirtió en Zizu. #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: Kevin Babik
timelineItems.text: That first touch by Chich deserved a goal! #ElTri

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Chicharito just missing that bit of confidence. Should get more chances to score though with Bosnia's high defensive line.

timelineItems.name: Tomas_Danicek
timelineItems.text: Salcido cant stop making crucial interceptions for #ElTri. Standing, sliding, whatever... not a problem at all. #MEXvBOS

timelineItems.comment: Héctor Herrera (Mexico) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Nabae Asfar
timelineItems.text: Hey, a #Bosnia player just leaped out of the #Mexico goal and snatched the ball up like a goalkeeper. Oh wait, that's the Mexico keeper.

timelineItems.name: Rodo
timelineItems.text: Mas fuertes y quizas mas rapidos los jugadores de bosnia #VamosMexico

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Miguel Layún (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Carlos Peña.

timelineItems.name: El Canaco
timelineItems.text: Why is everyone surprised Bosnia is giving Mexico a good match? This is #ElTri that barely qualified for World Cup, not El Tri of 2 yrs ago

timelineItems.name: ⚽️Karim Mendiburu
timelineItems.text: Muy buen partido intenso y con garra ojalá nadie salga lastimado. #VamosMexico

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sejad Salihovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.

timelineItems.name: Ogi Blagojevic
timelineItems.text: Mexico hasn't created too much, but they have shown that they can counter attack very well #MEXvBIH

timelineItems.name: Krishna ♡⚽♡
timelineItems.text: Un gol @CH14_ un gol por todos esos que confiamos en ti. #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: Erika Garza
timelineItems.text: Wow más de 60k aficionados en Soldier Field con @miseleccionmx #ElTri⚽️ 0-0

timelineItems.name: yolandanews
timelineItems.text: #chicago #soldierfield #mexico vs. #bosnia

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Toni Sunjic.

timelineItems.name: Richard Carrillo
timelineItems.text: Mexico necesita echarle muchisimas ganas!! Contra la peor defensiva y en 30 minutos no hemos gritado Goool! #VamosMexico

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Carlos Peña (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Héctor Herrera (Mexico).
Senad Lulic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Javier Hernández (Mexico).
Emir Spahic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Deboris
timelineItems.text: Guapísimos los jugadores de #Bosnia #MexicoVsBosnia

timelineItems.name: Cristoper Jair
timelineItems.text: Mejor trabajo en conjunto por parte de #Bosnia. #México, con más corazón que con juego busca abrir el marcador.

timelineItems.name: Rodrigo M.D.
timelineItems.text: Say what you want but Chicharito works his ass off #ElTri

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Mexico. Conceded by Mensur Mujdza.

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Carlos Salcido now playing in midfield, keeping an eye on Misimovic.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. José Juan Vázquez (Mexico) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Chris Tapia
timelineItems.text: I don't know about these red jerseys that Mexico is wearing. It needs some green on it at least. #ElTri

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Bosnia and Herzegovina) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Zvjezdan Misimovic.

timelineItems.name: Tomas_Danicek
timelineItems.text: Pena finally making a good run through the middle for #ElTri. Took him 38 mins. #MEXvBOS

timelineItems.name: AGUSTIN MARTINEZ
timelineItems.text: Layun ya se empieza a convertir nuevamente en Layun!!! #MexicoVsBosnia #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.name: RUBIELL
timelineItems.text: Ay ay ay ayyyyy canta y no llores #TRI #QuieroCreer XD

timelineItems.name: Ryan Bolling
timelineItems.text: There's the goal we were looking for! #MEXvBIH

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Shoddy defending from Mexico, nice move from Bosnia. Mexico 0-1 Bosnia.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Javier Hernández (Mexico).
Emir Spahic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Sacha Pisani
timelineItems.text: Galatasaray midfielder Izet Hajrovic opens the scoring for #Bosnia in the 41st minute. His second international goal. #Mexico

timelineItems.name: Rafikii ✌
timelineItems.text: La Selección no se veía tan mal desde el #Hexagonal! .... #Bosnia pos bajó de la nube !!!!

timelineItems.name: Scareface
timelineItems.text: La reacción tiene que ser inmediata #MexicovsBosnia #quierocreer, Croacia es mucho más peligrosa

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Izet Hajrovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) left footed shot from long range on the right misses to the right. Assisted by Muhamed Besic.

timelineItems.name: Esteban Cristancho
timelineItems.text: Para quienes no la conocían ahí la tienen. #Bosnia es una selección seria con muy buenos jugadores. Para mi le alcanza para pasar de ronda.

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Interesting switch tactically from Miguel Herrera, breaking his usual 5-3-2 and moving Salcido up into midfield.

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Mexico 0, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1.

timelineItems.name: Ogi Blagojevic
timelineItems.text: 1-0 at halftime for Bosnia and a well deserved lead. Could have easily been more goals than just the one we saw #MEXvBIH

timelineItems.name: christian montaño
timelineItems.text: Medio campo descompuesto, muy mal México pero.es.obvio que debe hacer ajustes por.la.lesión de.Montes #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Looks like Isaac Brizuela is coming on for Mexico.

timelineItems.name: Stephanie Fuerte
timelineItems.text: VAMOS MEXICO #ELTRI #MEXICO #BosniaAndHerzegovina

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Mexico 0, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1.

timelineItems.name: Religión Futbol
timelineItems.text: ¡Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrranca el Segundo Tiempo! @miseleccionmx 0-1 #Bosnia #VamosMéxico

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Miguel Herrera did say he would experiment in these friendlies.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Miralem Pjanic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Zvjezdan Misimovic.

timelineItems.name: polo_elephant
timelineItems.text: #mexico vs #Bosnia #gomexico

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Senad Lulic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: dillasdonuts
timelineItems.text: 2 American vatos now in for #ElTri (Brizuela and Ponce). Thanks Klinsmann.

timelineItems.name: Zach Powers
timelineItems.text: #Mexico coach & tv announcers say #Bosnia isnt taking this friendly seriously cause they changed their lineup last minute? Uh... #scoreboard

timelineItems.name: Tomas_Danicek
timelineItems.text: What's the point of giving an armband to Chicharito? To get him under even bigger pressure? #ElTri #MEXvBOS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Raúl Jiménez (Mexico).
Toni Sunjic (Bosnia and Herzegovina) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andrés Reyes
timelineItems.text: #Bosnia. Ojo con Pjanic. El MC es un todo terreno con gran disparo a distancia.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Muhamed Besic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: L.A. Beatriz
timelineItems.text: This 5-3-2 formation #ElTri uses won't work in the World Cup! The Bosnia team is showing every weakness in this defense! #smh

timelineItems.name: Juan Herrera
timelineItems.text: Miguel Ponce clearly doesn't look like he belongs in the lineup #ElTri

timelineItems.name: Luis Colli™
timelineItems.text: #Mexico perdiendo ante #bosnia , como que voy buscando una nueva nacionalidad.... adopter me?

timelineItems.name: Jaimit Bass
timelineItems.text: Peña sin Montes es como una papa sin catsup, #Gullit sin tu compadre te vas despidiendo de la titularidad que tenías ganada. #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.text: Juega mejor @miseleccionmx pero sigue faltando el gol que empate las cosas. 1-0 arriba #Bosnia

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Izet Hajrovic (Bosnia and Herzegovina).

timelineItems.name: Ozzie.
timelineItems.text: Maza what a joke! Hope Pulido gets a goal. #VamosMexico

timelineItems.name: Carlos Izquierdo
timelineItems.text: Es obvio que Herrera no tiene un cuadro titular aun. #ElTri

timelineItems.name: Emmanuel Escalante R
timelineItems.text: Ahora resulta que #Bosnia es una potencia futbolística pero no lo sabiamos. Nomás nos ganan y los pretextos le salen solos a @miseleccionmx

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Mexico missing Rafa Marquez tonight. Both in defense and as the player who starts the ball rolling when attacking.

timelineItems.name: Stephen Eastepp
timelineItems.text: Marco Fabian wants a starting spot. #ElTri

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Miguel Ponce (Mexico) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Miguel Layún.
Second Half ends, Mexico 0, Bosnia and Herzegovina 1.

timelineItems.name: Arthur Wilkie
timelineItems.text: Begovic is so class. #MEXvBIH

timelineItems.name: Tom Marshall
timelineItems.text: Miguel Herrera's undefeated start as Mexico coach comes to an end after 9 games. Mexico 0-1 Bosnia.

timelineItems.name: Uriel Contreras
timelineItems.text: Bosnia, durante toda la Copa del Mundo los estaré apoyando, pero esta noche es azteca. ¡Vamos, México! #ContigoSiempre #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.name: Cody Davis
timelineItems.text: Let's see if #ElTri can rebound from the loss of Luis Montes.

timelineItems.name: Arturo Pérez Chávez
timelineItems.text: Siempre me ha gustado el orgullo con el que el Chicharito canta el himno nacional mexicano. #QuieroCreer

timelineItems.name: Jason Marquitz
timelineItems.text: Hoping for Chich to exert some control over his spot and perhaps Ponce to play himself in to one tonight. #ElTri

timelineItems.name: Goal México
timelineItems.text: Mucha molestia en Miguel Herrera por un cambio de alineación por parte de #Bosnia al último instante. http://t.co/Nmt4CoZLBL
